transcripts.text: Next question, what is the future of Dudes Rock for 2020?  Because first of all, we should explain, it's not just me, I had to ask Matt at a bar what Dudes Rock was.  So first let's explain what Dudes Rock is and then let's explain what the future of it holds.

Like I literally, like not all men, I don't, it doesn't mean anything to me because I don't hold anything to those terms.  I am just a dude who rocks.
